TopicTitle: Astroboy820 is coming in for a descent

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I'm new, I just started to play KSP for about a week and I love it. After testing huge rockets (10-15 rockets) to small ones (1 or 2 rockets), I'm ready to make my own satellite. I got about 10 or 15 people out into orbit, and somehow, 3 people into orbit around the sun.

Hope to get to know you all.

Welcome to the forums!

I have only recently started planning for my first manned MÃƒÂ¼n mission after playing for a year.
Thanks everyone! I just put a satellite into orbit, but if I launch another one, can I program it to do something?

Thanks everyone! I just put a satellite into orbit, but if I launch another one, can I program it to do something?

With mods, most likely. without mods, not yet. although, adding items from the science tab will tell you things, because they all actually work.

I think the first Kerbal I got into orbit around the Sun was an accident, beacuse I got distracted by a slice of pizza while burning toward the Mun with a Mainsail engine, and when I turned back around, I was orbiting the Sun! Bright futures

EDIT: Come to think of it, poor Wilbro Kerman is still out there in orbit around the Sun. I really should rescue him one of these days...

Edited August 14, 2013 by Joshiewowa
A sudden realization.

I think the first Kerbal I got into orbit around the Sun was an accident, beacuse I got distracted by a slice of pizza while burning toward the Mun with a Mainsail engine, and when I turned back around, I was orbiting the Sun! Bright futures!

I remember back in 13.3 youd be always trying to get orbit, for like 50 launches, the one time you do make it you aren't looking and suddenly your'e in Solar orbit!
